p: However, a significantly remarkable reduction in adult emergence was observed in essential oil-treated insects (56.6 ± 3.3% for flower essential oil and 50 ± 1.5% for leaf essential oil) when compared to the control (83.33 ± 3.3%) (Fig. 3c). Adult emergence reduction was due to egg mortality because it was the same as egg hatch, and no larval mortality was recorded.
